game.name: Escape from Area 51
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You wake up after a crash. The only voice you hear is your digital assistant, you have only one chance to escape Area 51. You will embark on a journey full of mysteries and secrets to discover, why you ended up here, and, most importantly, who your true allies are, and who your enemies are.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You wake up after a crash. The only voice you hear is your digital assistant, you have only one chance to escape Area 51. You will embark on a journey full of mysteries and secrets to discover, why you ended up here, and, most importantly, who your true allies are, and who your enemies are.
